description: When attempting to append a new figure to an existing matplotlib plot, a runtime error is thrown that reads "ValueError: Expected x and y to have same first dimension, but have shapes (2, 3) and (3, 2) instead". This suggests that the x
code:
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

# Create two arrays of different shapes
x = [[1,2,3], [4,5,6]]
y = [[7,8], [9,10], [11,12]]

# Create
